title: Crazy idea but would be fun.
body:
So we all want a sandbox mode yeah?

Sandbox champ.

Its just a mannequin, where you pick and choose your abilities and passive from all the available abilities and passives already in the game.

Op? Fuck yes.

Fun? Fuck yes.

I could easily see myself sinking time into the game just trying different shit out like i dunno, master yi passive, with shyvana q on q and skarners q on w or something

Proceed to run around as ponycopter 2.o as you hit q proc  your passive instantly and reduce the cooldown of both q and w at the same time to repeat the process

Hell make it so you can only use champs you own as the selection pool and boom more incentive than ever to buy champs even if you wouldnt play them.

Just all around pure mindless fun.

Make your own creations and pit them against each other while cracking a cold one and swearing that you will give your mate cancer for picking that op combo of abilities.

want 4 ultimates as your kit? well dunno why you would want all of your kit to have a cooldown of 60 seconds plus but go for it.

replies.body: That'd be pretty great actually. Kogmaws afk speed with silver bolts and jinx's rockets?

Kog'maw with:
Q = Any ability that increases attack (damage - penetration)
W = Kog's W that gives him X2 attack speed
E = Silver bolts
Ult = Darius ult.

So basically gets a kill with Darius ult gains 200 ad has 5 attacks per sec each 3rd attack does true damage based on 8% of enemy max hp plus the extra damage or pene from q. I can see the cancer already.

That'd be sweet. Would have to be a custom game mode only though. 

How about Blitz's grab with kat's q and ulti + Brands's ulti
